name: Dragon Ball Adventure
description:
You'll gather up the strongest line-up of fighters to compete with other players around the world. Come and prove your strength!!!

Features:
Dozens of fighters from different planets are waiting to meet you and join your team.

Each fighter has his own unique skills. Super Combination Skills can be triggered when two-grid fighters with mission constraints appear in your team at the same time.

Powerful enemy attacks. Together with global players to defend your homeland!

Numerous global heroes join in the battles termly. There is only one King.

Restore the classic story and relive the initial move.
